casebody.data:
In the Matter of: JOHN C. PHILLIPS, JR., Claimant, CHARLOTTE, N. C.; WESTERN UNION TELEGRAPH COMPANY, Employer, CHARLOTTE, N. C.; STATE OF NORTH CAROLINA on Relationship of the EMPLOYMENT SECURITY COMMISSION OF NORTH CAROLINA, RALEIGH, N. C. (No. 532,

Fall Term, 1951)

Appeal by Employment Security Commission from Binh, J., June, 1951, Regular Term of Mecklenburg Superior Court. Meoklenbtjbg-County.

Appeal dismissed upon authority of In re Mitchell, 220 N.C. 65. This 7 November, 1951.

Valentine, J., for the Court.
